title: Kristufek's Hawthorne selections for Tuesday's races
text:
Here is today's link to Daily Herald handicapper Joe Kristufek's selections for Hawthorne Racecourse on Tuesday, Oct. 13.
Click on the attached PDF listed below to download and then print Joe's selections.
